title._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with musket] (LOC)

description._content: [Unidentified soldier in Union sergeant's uniform with musket] [between 1861 and 1865] 1 photograph : sixth-plate tintype, hand-colored ; 9.4 x 8.2 cm (case) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Case: Rinhart, no. 135 variant. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2010; (DLC/PP-2010:105). Purchased from: The Horse Soldier, Gettysburg, Pennsylvania, 2002. Subjects: United States.--Army--People--1860-1870. Tintypes--Hand-colored--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication.
